import java.io.*;
import java.util.*;
class dpp {
	public static void main(String args[]) throws Exception{
		BufferedReader bf=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
		PrintWriter pw=new PrintWriter(new OutputStreamWriter(System.out));
		String s[]=bf.readLine().trim().split(" ");
		int a=Integer.parseInt(s[0].trim());
		int b=Integer.parseInt(s[1].trim());
		s=bf.readLine().trim().split(" ");
		TreeSet<Integer> ts;
		int i=0;
		int arr[]=new int[a];
		for(String ss:s){
			arr[i++]=Integer.parseInt(ss.trim());
		}
		boolean kk[];
		int co=0;
		while(b-->0){
		//	ts=new TreeSet<Integer>();
			s=bf.readLine().trim().split(" ");
			int a1=Integer.parseInt(s[0].trim());
			int b1=Integer.parseInt(s[1].trim());
			kk=new boolean[101];
			co=0;
			for(int i1=a1-1;i1<b1;i1++)
				if(!kk[arr[i1]]){
					kk[arr[i1]]=true;
					co++;
				}
			pw.println(co);
		}
		pw.flush();pw.close();
	}
}
